mapper.select: SELECT id, knowledge_base_id, user_id, file_name, file_type, file_size, content, status, chunk_count, vectorized, error_message, created_at, updated_at FROM knowledge_document WHERE knowledge_base_id = #{knowledgeBaseId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, knowledge_base_id, user_id, file_name, file_type, file_size, content, status, chunk_count, vectorized, error_message, created_at, updated_at FROM knowledge_document WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, knowledge_base_id, user_id, file_name, file_type, file_size, content, status, chunk_count, vectorized, error_message, created_at, updated_at FROM knowledge_document WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_document (knowledge_base_id, user_id, file_name, file_type, file_size, content, status, chunk_count, vectorized, error_message, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{knowledgeBaseId}, #{userId}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{content}, #{status}, #{chunkCount}, #{vectorized}, #{errorMessage}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge_document SET file_name = #{fileName}, status = #{status}, chunk_count = #{chunkCount}, vectorized = #{vectorized}, error_message = #{errorMessage}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
